name: Tetrizo
description:
In the glorious Soviet Republic, regimes rise and fall, dictators come and go, buildings are constructed one day, before seemingly disappearing the next. It is a place of constant change, where the only constant is you.

Experience the World from the point-of-view of a simple peasant block. Stoic, unmoving. A piece in the great Communist machine. Spun and shuffled around, and just trying to find your place, in a World that feels ever out of your control.

--------------------------------------------

9 word summary: Tetris, but the block is constant, the World moves

--------------------------------------------

Tip: Play on Standard to get a taste, then move quickly to Hard to get really out of control.

--------------------------------------------

My first ever game. Completed as part of the #GMTKJam 2020. Be kind Comrades :)
